entities.name: master regulus
entities.description: Master Regulus is mentioned as a person who was dragged beneath the water.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who is being punished by himself due to Hermione's touch.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is crying and trying to hug Kreacher.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who scolds the elf for calling Hermione 'Mudblood'.

relationships.description: Kreacher is repulsed by Hermione's touch.
Harry scolds the elf for calling Hermione 'Mudblood'.
Kreacher obeys Harry's command to stop punishing himself.
